name: Claude Code (GLM)
description: Claude Code configured to use Z.AI's GLM model
installInstructions:
Set environment variables before running claude:
export ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL="https://open.bigmodel.cn/api/paas/v4/"
export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="your_z_ai_key"

commands.name: Configure GLM (Bash Profile)
commands.description: Add GLM config to ~/.bashrc for permanent use
commands.command: echo 'export ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL="https://open.bigmodel.cn/api/paas/v4/"' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="YOUR_Z_AI_KEY"' >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc && echo 'GLM environment configured in ~/.bashrc'

commands.name: Configure GLM (Zsh Profile)
commands.description: Add GLM config to ~/.zshrc for permanent use
commands.command: echo 'export ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL="https://open.bigmodel.cn/api/paas/v4/"' >> ~/.zshrc && echo 'export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="YOUR_Z_AI_KEY"' >> ~/.zshrc && source ~/.zshrc && echo 'GLM environment configured in ~/.zshrc'

commands.name: Configure GLM (Session)
commands.description: Copy env vars to paste in terminal for current session
